title: The RAAF aircraft apprentice scheme
creator_credit: Geoffrey Thompson, Australia. Royal Australian Air Force and Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau
brief_description: Shows opportunities for boys to take up trades in the RAAF. They begin a 5 year course at Wagga (NSW). Then according to aptitude and ambition, they go on to learn care and repair of ground transport, aero engines, aircraft, armaments, radio and electronic equipment. The film stresses the chances for a full life in training, higher study and promotion.
